text: is a Japanese voice actor, narrator, and singer. He debuted as a voice actor in 2009. Notable roles played by him include Hyōga Yukimura from Inazuma Eleven Go, Shin Ichijo from the King of Prism series, Takeru Taiga from The Idolmaster: SideM, and Hisoka Mikage from A3!. In addition to voice acting, Terashima also started a singing career in 2019 with the release of the extended plays 29 + 1: Miso and Joy Source. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of extended plays, with selected chart positions, sales figures and certifications |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:12em;" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Year ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="2" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales Sales figures for physical releases on the Oricon Weekly Album Chart: * 29 + 1: Miso: * Joy Source: Peak chart positions on the Billboard Japan Top Albums: * 29 + 1: Miso: * Joy Source: ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Certifications |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;" | JPN Oricon Peak chart positions on the Oricon Weekly Albums Chart: * 29 + 1: Miso: * Joy Source: ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;" | JPN Hot Peak chart positions on the Billboard Japan Hot Albums: * 29 + 1: Miso: * Joy Source: |- ! scope="row"| 29 + 1: Miso | rowspan="2" | 2019 | * Released: March 3, 2019 * Label: Feel Mee * Formats: CD, digital download | 18 | 28 | * JPN: 4,254 | |- ! scope="row"| Joy Source | * Released: October 23, 2019 * Label: Feel Mee * Formats: CD, digital download | 21 | 24 | * JPN: 3,198 | |- | colspan="7" style="font-size:90%;" | "—" denotes releases that did not chart or were not released in that region. |- |} ==Filmography== ===Anime=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
